BeforeLogging (Aspect)Â¶

Brief Description: This aspect is used to log the execution of a function before it will execute.

Detailed Description:

In conjunction with this aspect use an aspect that provides a implementation for the acp::logging_msg_builder::build_after_msg() method. Similar to the AfterLogging aspect, this aspect logs the function signature - but only - before the function will execute.

In file src/functionality/before_logging.ah

before_logging (Attribute)Â¶

Brief Description: Functions with this attribute will be logged before their execution.

ignore (Pointcut)Â¶

See: CoreAspect::ignore

logging-advice (Advice)Â¶

Brief Description: This advice handles the logging behavior before the function executes.

where (Pointcut)Â¶

See: CoreAspect::where
